title: 1000+ Ping
body: I just got a new computer...better than my last one and league ran fine on it. Now I get lag 1000+ almost ever game! I have nothing open but league and everything is on the lowest settings. I just want to play league without lag please help.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a strong connection with the game, otherwise you may experience problems like input delay.  I suggest going over each step in our [troubleshooting connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
So, I went to that link and I watched the video. It said click the turn off firewall thing, but when I went to mine there was no option for me to click it. I'm on windows 10 if that helps

No worries, our[ hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) can help!  After downloading it, you'll find a series of options that helps resolve some issues.  For your specific issue, you will find an option to configure firewall settings to allow League access.  Hope that helps!
Ok so I did that and now I have LoL and still can't access the firewall off/on
Do I hit start if the Gather System & LoL Logs has a check in its box?
